websiteTool.title: Website Tool

websiteAnalyzer.pageTitle: Is Your Website Using EU-Friendly Services? Find Out!
websiteAnalyzer.invalidUrlError: Please enter a valid website URL
websiteAnalyzer.emptyStateTitle: Enter your URL to get started!
websiteAnalyzer.emptyStateDescription: We'll instantly show you which services your website relies on and whether they're EU-compliant.

step1.title: Enter Your Website URL
step1.description: Provide your website address to start checking the services your site currently uses.

step2.title: Instant Domain Check
step2.description: Our tool automatically detects your website's third-party services and identifies whether they're EU-based.

step3.title: View Results
step3.description: Instantly see which services you're using, their EU compliance status, and receive recommendations for EU-friendly alternatives.

websiteAnalyzer.ctaDescription: Discover EU alternatives for any non-EU services detected on your website and follow our step-by-step migration guides.

results.congratulations: Congratulations! Your website is using 100% EU-based services.
